title: Flock's gunshot detection microphones will start listening for human voices
author: hhs
aiHeadline: Flock's gunshot detection microphones, which were already creepy enough, are now doubling down on their surveillance by listening in on human voices—because nothing says 'public safety' like turning everyone into a potential suspect.

title: How I influence tech company politics as a staff software engineer
author: facundo_olano
aiHeadline: How I influence tech company politics as a staff software engineer: by carefully navigating the minefield of office drama, corporate jargon, and the occasional existential crisis that comes with trying to make sense of the madness.

title: The UK is still trying to backdoor encryption for Apple users
author: CharlesW
aiHeadline: The UK is still trying to backdoor encryption for Apple users, proving once again that when it comes to privacy, the government's idea of 'security' is basically 'we want to snoop on your messages, but we'll do it politely.'

title: Alibaba cloud FPGA: the $200 Kintex UltraScale+
author: signa11
aiHeadline: Alibaba cloud FPGA: the $200 Kintex UltraScale+—because who needs a fancy, expensive FPGA when you can just rent one from the cloud? Oh, right, that's the point.

title: Paged Out Issue #7 [pdf]
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: Paged Out Issue #7 [pdf]: because sometimes, the only way to truly understand the past is to read it on paper, away from the distractions of the digital world—unless, of course, you're too lazy to actually print it out.
